title: The Parisian Auteur
overview: Discover a side of Paris often missed by tourists. From private viewings at art ateliers in Montmartre to a masterclass in French pastry making, this journey is designed for the refined traveler looking to immerse themselves in the true culture of France.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Private Dinner
itinerary.desc: Private transfer to your boutique hotel in Le Marais. Evening welcome dinner on a private Seine river cruise to meet your guides.

itinerary.title: Hidden Art of Montmartre
itinerary.desc: A guided walking tour of the artists' quarter, visiting studios of upcoming painters that are usually closed to the public.

itinerary.title: Culinary Masterclass
itinerary.desc: Visit a local market to pick fresh ingredients, followed by a cooking class with a Michelin-star chef.

itinerary.title: Louvre After Hours
itinerary.desc: Exclusive evening access to the Louvre museum to view the Mona Lisa without the crowds.

itinerary.title: Au Revoir
itinerary.desc: Breakfast at a classic bistro followed by private transfer to Charles de Gaulle Airport.

title: Dubai Skyline
overview: Experience the futuristic marvels of Dubai. From the top of the Burj Khalifa to the golden dunes of the Arabian desert, this trip defines luxury. Includes VIP shopping experiences and yacht access.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Marina Cruise
itinerary.desc: VIP Airport pickup and evening yacht cruise on the Dubai Marina with dinner.

itinerary.title: Burj Khalifa & Mall
itinerary.desc: VIP access to the 148th floor of the Burj Khalifa and a personal shopper experience at Dubai Mall.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari
itinerary.desc: 4x4 Dune bashing, camel riding, and a private BBQ dinner under the stars in a luxury desert camp.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Free morning for leisure before private transfer to DXB Airport.

title: Bali Serenity
overview: Reconnect with nature in the spiritual heart of Bali. This retreat focuses on mindfulness, featuring daily yoga sessions, waterfall hikes, and traditional Balinese healing ceremonies.

itinerary.title: Ubud Arrival
itinerary.desc: Check into your private rainforest villa. Welcome massage at the resort spa.

itinerary.title: Sunrise Yoga & Temple
itinerary.desc: Early morning yoga session followed by a visit to the Tirta Empul water temple for a purification ritual.

itinerary.title: Rice Terrace Trek
itinerary.desc: Trekking through the Tegalalang Rice Terrace with a local guide, followed by organic lunch.

itinerary.title: Waterfall Chase
itinerary.desc: Visit the hidden Tegenungan Waterfall and swim in natural pools.

itinerary.title: Healer Visit
itinerary.desc: Private session with a traditional Balinese healer.

itinerary.title: Leisure Day
itinerary.desc: Free day to explore Ubud market or relax by the pool.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Transfer to Denpasar Airport.

title: Alpine Solitude
overview: Hiking through the silent valleys of the Swiss Alps, enjoying chocolate tasting, and scenic train rides. Perfect for those seeking fresh air and breathtaking mountain views.

itinerary.title: Zurich Arrival
itinerary.desc: City tour of Zurich and a sunset cruise on Lake Zurich.

itinerary.title: Train to Interlaken
itinerary.desc: Scenic train ride through the mountains to Interlaken.

itinerary.title: Jungfraujoch
itinerary.desc: Excursion to the 'Top of Europe' via the cogwheel train.

itinerary.title: Grindelwald Hike
itinerary.desc: Guided hiking trail beneath the Eiger North Face.

itinerary.title: Lucerne
itinerary.desc: Visit the Chapel Bridge and enjoy a Swiss fondue dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Train back to Zurich Airport for departure.

title: Kyoto Bloom
overview: Step back in time to ancient Japan. Walk through thousands of torii gates, participate in a traditional tea ceremony, and witness the geisha district of Gion at dusk.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kyoto
itinerary.desc: Bullet train arrival and check-in to a traditional Ryokan.

itinerary.title: Fushimi Inari
itinerary.desc: Early morning hike through the famous red Torii gates.

itinerary.title: Arashiyama Bamboo
itinerary.desc: Walk through the bamboo grove and visit the Tenryu-ji temple.

itinerary.title: Gion District
itinerary.desc: Evening walking tour of Gion hoping to spot Geishas, followed by Kaiseki dinner.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Bullet train transfer to Osaka or Tokyo.

title: Santorini Sunset
overview: The ultimate romantic getaway. White-washed villas, blue domes, and the world's most famous sunset in Oia. Relax on volcanic beaches and taste local wines.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Thira
itinerary.desc: Ferry arrival and transfer to cliffside hotel.

itinerary.title: Oia Sunset
itinerary.desc: Free day exploring Oia village followed by a sunset dinner reservation.

itinerary.title: Volcano Cruise
itinerary.desc: Catamaran cruise to the volcanic hot springs with lunch on board.

itinerary.title: Wine Tasting
itinerary.desc: Tour of 3 traditional wineries tasting Assyrtiko wine.

itinerary.title: Red Beach
itinerary.desc: Relaxation day at the famous Red Beach.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Transfer to Santorini Airport.
